overview: Passing through a jail and construction site, Young-Dal, a young laborer, meets middle-aged Mr. Jeong, who is returning to Sampo after ten years' absence. Together, they track down Baek-Hwa, a young woman who ran away from the restaurant she was waitressing at, but instead of turning her in for a reward, the trio decide to go on an adventure together.
title: The Road to Sampo
